column5: Hi guys, can someone give me directions to a nice boat launch in trenton, I'm coming from Hamilton.  I'm going there on Saturday and I know it's going to be busy so a place that has parking would be nice.  I don't mind if I have to pay to park and launch.  Thanks
There's a launch right at the mouth of the Trent River, behind the Price Choppers, roughly here
Read on the Quinte forum that the boat launch in Trenton is closed due to low water.  Might want to double check.
Hi LD17,  Here is a map of boat ramps on the Bay.  http://www.fishingbayofquinte.com/maps/boat-ramps/  Cheers, Aron
thanks Mako.  I'm heading to bed now I got a long drive in the early morning.  Take care guys
